author: blair
msg: Since this class derives from java.util.HashMap which implements
Serializable, add a serialVersionUID to this private static class

author: blair
msg: Make any the JavaHL classes that contain data and make no references
to any native methods serializable that could be used by somebody who
would want to serialize them.  Any incompatibile changes to these
classes should increment the serialVersionUID field.
Make all these classes implement java.io.Serializable and add a
private static final long serialVersionUID set to 1L.

author: dlr
msg: Correct error handling for property merges involving "svn:mergeinfo".

author: joeswatosh
msg: Deal with compiler warning for multiple definition of snprintf macro.
(get_win_defines): Don't define snprintf for the Ruby projects since ruby.h

author: dlr
msg: Update status after recent meeting with some Subversion dev Googlers.
Note that a command-line UI for revision ranges is post-1.5.
Note that the libsvn_client API capable of listing "all unmerged
revisions" needs a new RA call, and should recurse by default.
Sign up Ben (sussman) for handling merge notifications.
Attempt to clarify "svn:mergeinfo" prop merge notifications sub-task.
Add more info around "multiple notifications for single WC items" sub-task.
Note the desired use case for deferring merge conflict resolution
interactivity until as late in the merge process as possible.
Remove inherited merge info sub-task, basically completed (by pburba).
Note desire to break command-line UI compat for WC -> WC copy/move.
Add task for handling merge info differences for switched
Add task for handling sparsely-populated directories, or portions of
a tree not checked out due to lack of authorization.
